author: Linda Smith

review: I, too, was able to get the fire stick during the $19 sale. For the price, why not.I like it better than the Chromecast, but it is getting serious competition from my Roku Stick.Like:  Content and access to my Prime account (Kindle user takes a pick and I put it on the TV for a slide show)Dislike:  User interface is lacking, but the biggest hiccup is the remote.  Mine has a tendency to "run away" from me when in use.  Here's what I mean:  I click the right side of the 'circle' to go to the next movie in the list.  Click again (next movie), then again, and again, and then all the sudden I see a whole list of movies flying by.  I'm not holding the button down.  There does not seem to be a rhyme or reason for how far it goes or when it starts/stops.  To bypass this I just download the app and use my smartphone.  The remote has been in the closet for a month or so now and I don't miss it (of note, i have the same issue with my Roku Stick remote.  It may have to do with the location of the devices (closet around the corner from the TV).All in all:  A solid 4 stars.  I think the user interface could use a few updates, more apps, and a better remote, but for the money and content, it's a good device, esp if you're an Amazon Prime member.
